title: LYMA
info:
Trusted with the task of introducing LYMA, a revolutionary luxury supplement, we took on the roles of designing its debut packaging, crafting its web presence, and establishing its distinctive brand identity. Despite facing various challenges, we managed to successfully deliver initial launch advertisements, innovative packaging designs, and compelling media content.
Headless Horse took charge of website design, curated social media content, and early packaging concepts, leading to prominent features in Vogue Paris, Harper's Bazaar, and Elle. Coined as 'the Bulgari of supplements' by The Evening Standard, our endeavours not only piqued global interest and captivated influential figures but also rapidly generated millions in startup value within a remarkably brief span of 12 months.

title: TEAM DR JOSEPH
info:
Packaging design for TEAM DR JOSEPH: Sustainable proven certified natural skincare. Handmade in Italy, since 1986. The revised packaging shows a handful of carefully considered details from the revised wordmark, the introduction of a new insignia, typographic updates and material updates, including a new recyclable wooden cap and FSC recycled paper produced domestically in Italy.
A detail we are incredibly proud of is the culmination of many hours of research and development to create the new flower detail on the box. Founder Erb. Dipl. Dr. Joseph Franz during his research has collected flower presses from the laboratories’ gardens since 1986 in a library called the Herbarium. We have taken scans of the flowers and created 1:1 embossings of these pressing them into the packaging for a tactile finish and meeting the objective of eliminating coloured inks from the product packaging.

title: Billelis: In Memoriam
info: Headless Horse collaborated with Billelis to curate the digital canvas for his NFT auction. Crafting a virtual gallery, we wove into the narrative for the collection, building anticipation in the lead-up to the sale. Post-auction, our collaboration extended as we created a book that was distributed to collectors who obtained all eight unique artworks during the sale. Partnering with the esteemed French artistic printing company, Imprimerie du Marais, we brought the artist's vision to life through exquisite packaging and foiled artworks, each page narrating the moving story behind its creation.

title: Tiffers
info: Made to order and hand made in England, Tiffers is a luxury ready to wear millinery studio incorporating British ornithology. We were approached to deliver branding, stationary, website design and content as part of their 2023 launch.

title: Nike: Air Max Day
info: This marble shoe was hand carved by Alasdair Thomson for Nike Air Max Day, 2017. Nike, the Greek goddess of victory, sister of Strength, Force and Zeal. Headless Horse delivered Nike Air Max, hand carved in white marble by sculptor, Alasdair Thomson. The Horsemen decided to celebrate Air Max Day 2017, with an immortal representation of grecian style, set in stone.

title: Chanel: No5
info:
White Carrara marble, Chanel No5, bottle. Hand carved from marble, gilded with 24-carat gold leaf, and encased in a refurbished ammunition crate lined with crushed black velvet.
In memory of Robin Abbey 1948 - 2019.

title: @pizza
info: Creative for @pizza: At the Royal Mile, a former Police Station with three floors, Headless Horse designed artwork for 9 elevations. For Birmingham's Grand Central Railway Station, our proposal included panel lighting inspired by railway tracks, leading to a neon brand logo. Headless Horse also crafted artwork for the main interior wall.

title: Renderboxes
info: Branding, packaging, and website design for Renderboxes positioned them as a top-tier choice in GPU Rendering Workstations. Our focus was on creating functional, aesthetically pleasing solutions that resonate with professionals seeking high-performance computing solutions.
